text: Breathe (TC: 呼吸) is a Cantopop album by Edmond Leung. ==Track listing== #Breathe (呼吸) #Can or Can't (可不可不可以) #Dear (親愛的) #Lovelorn Ten Thousand Times (失戀一萬次) #Punish Me (懲罰我) #Three Broken Hearts (傷了三個心) #Love and Affection (愛與情) #All I Need Is Love (我需要的只是愛) #I Want To Fly (我要先飛) #I Am Wrong (我錯) #Fight For Tomorrow (為明日爭氣) #Color, Aroma and Taste (濃情色香味) ==Charts== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (1996) !Peak position |- | IFPI Hong Kong Group | align="center"|1 |} ==Music awards== {| class="wikitable" !width=60|Year !width="370"|Ceremony !width="400"|Award |- | align="center" | 1996 | Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation 1996 JSG Best Ten Music Awards Presentation List Retrieved 29 July 2016. | Top 10 Song Awards - Breathe (呼吸) |} ==References== Category:Edmond Leung albums Category:1996 albums
title: Breathe (Edmond Leung album)
